move.name: Absorb
move.description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

move.name: Acrobatics
move.description: Stronger when the user does not have a held item.

move.name: After You
move.description: Gives target priority in the next turn.

move.name: Anchor Shot
move.description: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.

move.name: Ancient Power
move.description: May raise all user's stats at once.

move.name: Aqua Ring
move.description: Restores a little HP each turn.

move.name: Aromatherapy
move.description: Cures all status problems in your party.

move.name: Assist
move.description: User performs a move known by its allies at random.

move.name: Assurance
move.description: Power doubles if opponent already took damage in the same turn.

move.name: Attract
move.description: If opponent is the opposite gender, it's less likely to attack.

move.name: Aurora Veil
move.description: Halves damage from Physical and Special attacks for five turns.

move.name: Autotomize
move.description: Reduces weight and sharply raises Speed.

move.name: Avalanche
move.description: Power doubles if user took damage first.

move.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
move.description: Always goes first. Lowers the target's attack.

move.name: Baneful Bunker
move.description: Protects the user and poisons opponent on contact.

move.name: Baton Pass
move.description: User switches out and gives stat changes to the incoming Pokémon.

move.name: Beak Blast
move.description: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the Pokémon while it's heating up its beak results in a burn.

move.name: Beat Up
move.description: Each Pokémon in your party attacks.

move.name: Belch
move.description: User must have consumed a Berry.

move.name: Belly Drum
move.description: User loses 50% of its max HP, but Attack raises to maximum.

move.name: Bestow
move.description: Gives the user's held item to the target.

move.name: Bide
move.description: User takes damage for two turns then strikes back double.

move.name: Bind
move.description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

move.name: Blaze Kick
move.description: High critical hit ratio. May burn opponent.

move.name: Bounce
move.description: Springs up on first turn, attacks on second. May paralyze opponent.

move.name: Bouncy Bubble
move.description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

move.name: Brick Break
move.description: Breaks through Reflect and Light Screen barriers.

move.name: Brine
move.description: Power doubles if opponent's HP is less than 50%.

move.name: Brutal Swing
move.description: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

move.name: Bug Bite
move.description: Receives the effect from the opponent's held berry.

move.name: Burn Up
move.description: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.

move.name: Calm Mind
move.description: Raises user's Special Attack and Special Defense.

move.name: Camouflage
move.description: Changes user's type according to the location.

move.name: Captivate
move.description: Sharply lowers opponent's Special Attack if opposite gender.

move.name: Celebrate
move.description: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day. No battle effect.

move.name: Charge
move.description: Raises user's Special Defense and next Electric move's power increases.

move.name: Circle Throw
move.description: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

move.name: Clamp
move.description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

move.name: Clear Smog
move.description: Removes all of the target's stat changes.

move.name: Close Combat
move.description: Lowers user's Defense and Special Defense.

move.name: Coil
move.description: Raises user's Attack, Defense and Accuracy.

move.name: Constrict
move.description: May lower opponent's Speed by one stage.

move.name: Conversion
move.description: Changes user's type to that of its first move.

move.name: Conversion 2
move.description: User changes type to become resistant to opponent's last move.

move.name: Core Enforcer
move.description: Scorches a 'Z' pattern on the ground.

move.name: Cosmic Power
move.description: Raises user's Defense and Special Defense.

move.name: Counter
move.description: When hit by a Physical Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

move.name: Covet
move.description: Opponent's item is stolen by the user.

move.name: Crafty Shield
move.description: Protects the Pokémon from status moves.

move.name: Cross Poison
move.description: High critical hit ratio. May poison opponent.

move.name: Crush Grip
move.description: More powerful when opponent has higher HP.

move.name: Curse
move.description: Ghosts lose 50% of max HP and curse the opponent; Non-Ghosts raise Attack, Defense and lower Speed.

move.name: Dark Void
move.description: Puts all adjacent opponents to sleep.

move.name: Defend Order
move.description: Raises user's Defense and Special Defense.

move.name: Defog
move.description: Lowers opponent's Evasiveness and clears fog.

move.name: Destiny Bond
move.description: If the user faints, the opponent also faints.

move.name: Detect
move.description: Protects the user, but may fail if used consecutively.

move.name: Dig
move.description: Digs underground on first turn, attacks on second. Can also escape from caves.

move.name: Disable
move.description: Opponent can't use its last attack for a few turns.

move.name: Dive
move.description: Dives underwater on first turn, attacks on second turn.

move.name: Double Iron Bash
move.description: Hits twice in one turn; may cause flinching.

move.name: Dragon Ascent
move.description: Lowers user's Defense and Special Defense.

move.name: Dragon Hammer
move.description: The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the target and inflict damage.

move.name: Dragon Tail
move.description: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

move.name: Drain Punch
move.description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

move.name: Draining Kiss
move.description: User recovers most the HP inflicted on opponent.

move.name: Dream Eater
move.description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on a sleeping opponent.

move.name: Earthquake
move.description: Power is doubled if opponent is underground from using Dig.

move.name: Electric Terrain
move.description: Prevents all Pokémon from falling asleep for 5 turns.

move.name: Electrify
move.description: Changes the target's move to Electric type.

move.name: Electro Ball
move.description: The faster the user, the stronger the attack.

move.name: Encore
move.description: Forces opponent to keep using its last move for 3 turns.

move.name: Endeavor
move.description: Reduces opponent's HP to same as user's.

move.name: Endure
move.description: Always left with at least 1 HP, but may fail if used consecutively.

move.name: Entrainment
move.description: Makes target's ability same as user's.

move.name: Eruption
move.description: Stronger when the user's HP is higher.

move.name: Extreme Evoboost
move.description: Eevee-exclusive Z-Move. Sharply raises all stats.

move.name: Facade
move.description: Power doubles if user is burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.

move.name: Fairy Lock
move.description: Prevents fleeing in the next turn.

move.name: Fake Out
move.description: User attacks first, foe flinches. Only usable on first turn.

move.name: False Swipe
move.description: Always leaves opponent with at least 1 HP.

move.name: Feint
move.description: Only hits if opponent uses Protect or Detect in the same turn.

move.name: Fell Stinger
move.description: Drastically raises user's Attack if target is KO'd.

move.name: Final Gambit
move.description: Inflicts damage equal to the user's remaining HP. User faints.

move.name: Fire Fang
move.description: May cause flinching and/or burn opponent.

move.name: Fire Lash
move.description: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

move.name: Fire Pledge
move.description: Added effects appear if combined with Grass Pledge or Water Pledge.

move.name: Fire Spin
move.description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

move.name: First Impression
move.description: Although this move has great power, it only works the first turn the user is in battle.

move.name: Flail
move.description: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

move.name: Flare Blitz
move.description: User receives recoil damage. May burn opponent.

move.name: Flatter
move.description: Confuses opponent, but raises its Special Attack by two stages.

move.name: Floral Healing
move.description: The user restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain is grass.

move.name: Flower Shield
move.description: Sharply raises Defense of all Grass-type Pokémon on the field.

move.name: Fly
move.description: Flies up on first turn, attacks on second turn.

move.name: Flying Press
move.description: Deals Fighting and Flying type damage.

move.name: Focus Punch
move.description: If the user is hit before attacking, it flinches instead.

move.name: Follow Me
move.description: In Double Battle, the user takes all the attacks.

move.name: Foresight
move.description: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, Normal-type and Fighting-type attacks can now hit Ghosts, and Ghost-type attacks hit Normal.

move.name: Freeze Shock
move.description: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May paralyze opponent.

move.name: Freeze-Dry
move.description: May freeze opponent. Super-effective against Water types.

move.name: Frost Breath
move.description: Always results in a critical hit.

move.name: Fusion Bolt
move.description: Power increases if Fusion Flare is used in the same turn.

move.name: Fusion Flare
move.description: Power increases if Fusion Bolt is used in the same turn.

move.name: Gastro Acid
move.description: Cancels out the effect of the opponent's Ability.

move.name: Gear Up
move.description: The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

move.name: Geomancy
move.description: Charges on first turn, sharply raises user's Sp. Attack, Sp. Defense and Speed on the second.

move.name: Giga Drain
move.description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

move.name: Grass Knot
move.description: The heavier the opponent, the stronger the attack.

move.name: Grass Pledge
move.description: Added effects appear if preceded by Water Pledge or succeeded by Fire Pledge.

move.name: Grassy Terrain
move.description: Restores a little HP of all Pokémon for 5 turns.

move.name: Gravity
move.description: Prevents moves like Fly and Bounce and the Ability Levitate for 5 turns.

move.name: Growth
move.description: Raises user's Attack and Special Attack.

move.name: Grudge
move.description: If the users faints after using this move, the PP for the opponent's last move is depleted.

move.name: Guard Split
move.description: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.

move.name: Guard Swap
move.description: User and opponent swap Defense and Special Defense.

move.name: Guardian of Alola
move.description: Tapu-exclusive Z-move. Cuts opponent's HP by 75%.

move.name: Gust
move.description: Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce with double power.

move.name: Gyro Ball
move.description: The slower the user, the stronger the attack.

move.name: Hail
move.description: Non-Ice types are damaged for 5 turns.

move.name: Happy Hour
move.description: Doubles prize money from trainer battles.

move.name: Heal Bell
move.description: Heals the user's party's status conditions.

move.name: Heal Block
move.description: Prevents the opponent from restoring HP for 5 turns.

move.name: Heal Order
move.description: User recovers half its max HP.

move.name: Heal Pulse
move.description: Restores half the target's max HP.

move.name: Healing Wish
move.description: The user faints and the next Pokémon released is fully healed.

move.name: Heart Swap
move.description: Stat changes are swapped with the opponent.

move.name: Heat Crash
move.description: The heavier the user, the stronger the attack.

move.name: Heavy Slam
move.description: The heavier the user, the stronger the attack.

move.name: Helping Hand
move.description: In Double Battles, boosts the power of the partner's move.

move.name: Hex
move.description: Inflicts more damage if the target has a status condition.

move.name: Hidden Power
move.description: Type and power depends on user's IVs.

move.name: High Horsepower
move.description: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

move.name: High Jump Kick
move.description: If it misses, the user loses half their HP.

move.name: Hold Back
move.description: Always leaves opponent with at least 1 HP.

move.name: Hold Hands
move.description: Makes the user and an ally very happy.

move.name: Horn Leech
move.description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

move.name: Hyperspace Fury
move.description: Lowers user's Defense. Can strike through Protect/Detect.

move.name: Ice Ball
move.description: Doubles in power each turn for 5 turns.

move.name: Ice Burn
move.description: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May burn opponent.

move.name: Ice Fang
move.description: May cause flinching and/or freeze opponent.

move.name: Ice Hammer
move.description: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however.

move.name: Imprison
move.description: Opponent is unable to use moves that the user also knows.

move.name: Infestation
move.description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

move.name: Ingrain
move.description: User restores HP each turn. User cannot escape/switch.

move.name: Instruct
move.description: Allows an ally to use a move instead.

move.name: Judgment
move.description: Type depends on the Arceus Plate being held.

move.name: Jump Kick
move.description: If it misses, the user loses half their HP.

move.name: King's Shield
move.description: Protects the user and lowers opponent's Attack on contact.

move.name: Knock Off
move.description: Removes opponent's held item for the rest of the battle.

move.name: Laser Focus
move.description: User's next attack is guaranteed to result in a critical hit.

move.name: Last Resort
move.description: Can only be used after all other moves are used.

move.name: Leech Life
move.description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

move.name: Leech Seed
move.description: Drains HP from opponent each turn.

move.name: Light Screen
move.description: Halves damage from Special attacks for 5 turns.

move.name: Light That Burns the Sky
move.description: Ultra Necrozma-exclusive Z-Move. Ignores target's ability; uses highest Attack stat.

move.name: Liquidation
move.description: The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

move.name: Lock-On
move.description: User's next attack is guaranteed to hit.

move.name: Low Kick
move.description: The heavier the opponent, the stronger the attack.

move.name: Lucky Chant
move.description: Opponent cannot land critical hits for 5 turns.

move.name: Lunar Dance
move.description: The user faints but the next Pokémon released is fully healed.

move.name: Lunge
move.description: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

move.name: Magic Coat
move.description: Reflects moves that cause status conditions back to the attacker.

move.name: Magic Room
move.description: Suppresses the effects of held items for five turns.

move.name: Magma Storm
move.description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

move.name: Magnet Rise
move.description: User becomes immune to Ground-type moves for 5 turns.

move.name: Magnetic Flux
move.description: Raises Defense and Sp. Defense of Plus/Minus Pokémon.

move.name: Me First
move.description: User copies the opponent's attack with 1.5× power.

move.name: Mega Drain
move.description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

move.name: Memento
move.description: User faints, sharply lowers opponent's Attack and Special Attack.

move.name: Metal Burst
move.description: Deals damage equal to 1.5x opponent's attack.

move.name: Metronome
move.description: User performs almost any move in the game at random.

move.name: Milk Drink
move.description: User recovers half its max HP.

move.name: Mind Reader
move.description: User's next attack is guaranteed to hit.

move.name: Miracle Eye
move.description: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, removes Dark's Psychic immunity.

move.name: Mirror Coat
move.description: When hit by a Special Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

move.name: Mirror Move
move.description: User performs the opponent's last move.

move.name: Mist
move.description: User's stats cannot be changed for a period of time.

move.name: Misty Terrain
move.description: Protects the field from status conditions for 5 turns.

move.name: Moonlight
move.description: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

move.name: Morning Sun
move.description: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

move.name: Mud Sport
move.description: Weakens the power of Electric-type moves.

move.name: Natural Gift
move.description: Power and type depend on the user's held berry.

move.name: Nature Power
move.description: Uses a certain move based on the current terrain.

move.name: Night Shade
move.description: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

move.name: Nightmare
move.description: The sleeping opponent loses 25% of its max HP each turn.

move.name: Noble Roar
move.description: Lowers opponent's Attack and Special Attack.

move.name: Oblivion Wing
move.description: User recovers most of the HP inflicted on opponent.

move.name: Odor Sleuth
move.description: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, Normal-type and Fighting-type attacks can now hit Ghosts, and Ghost-type attacks hit Normal.

move.name: Ominous Wind
move.description: May raise all user's stats at once.

move.name: Outrage
move.description: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

move.name: Pain Split
move.description: The user's and opponent's HP becomes the average of both.

move.name: Parabolic Charge
move.description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

move.name: Parting Shot
move.description: Lowers opponent's Attack and Special Attack then switches out.

move.name: Pay Day
move.description: A small amount of money is gained after the battle resolves.

move.name: Payback
move.description: Power doubles if the user was attacked first.

move.name: Perish Song
move.description: Any Pokémon in play when this attack is used faints in 3 turns.

move.name: Petal Dance
move.description: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

move.name: Phantom Force
move.description: Disappears on first turn, attacks on second. Can strike through Protect/Detect.

move.name: Photon Geyser
move.description: Uses Attack or Special Attack stat, whichever is higher.

move.name: Pika Papow
move.description: Power increases when player's bond is stronger.

move.name: Plasma Fists
move.description: Changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

move.name: Pluck
move.description: If the opponent is holding a berry, its effect is stolen by user.

move.name: Poison Tail
move.description: High critical hit ratio. May poison opponent.

move.name: Pollen Puff
move.description: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead.

move.name: Powder
move.description: Damages Pokémon using Fire type moves.

move.name: Power Split
move.description: Averages Attack and Special Attack with the target.

move.name: Power Swap
move.description: User and opponent swap Attack and Special Attack.

move.name: Power Trick
move.description: User's own Attack and Defense switch.

move.name: Power Trip
move.description: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the move's power.

move.name: Prismatic Laser
move.description: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of a prism. The user can't move on the next turn.

move.name: Protect
move.description: Protects the user, but may fail if used consecutively.

move.name: Psychic Fangs
move.description: The user bites the target with its psychic capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen and Reflect.

move.name: Psychic Terrain
move.description: Prevents priority moves from being used for 5 turns.

move.name: Psycho Shift
move.description: Gives the opponent the user's status condition, if it hits.

move.name: Psyshock
move.description: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

move.name: Psystrike
move.description: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

move.name: Punishment
move.description: Power increases when opponent's stats have been raised.

move.name: Purify
move.description: The user heals the target's status condition. If the move succeeds, it also restores the user's own HP.

move.name: Pursuit
move.description: Double power if the opponent is switching out.

move.name: Quash
move.description: Makes the target act last this turn.

move.name: Quick Guard
move.description: Protects the user's team from high-priority moves.

move.name: Quiver Dance
move.description: Raises user's Special Attack, Special Defense and Speed.

move.name: Rage Powder
move.description: Forces attacks to hit user, not team-mates.

move.name: Razor Wind
move.description: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. High critical hit ratio.

move.name: Recover
move.description: User recovers half its max HP.

move.name: Recycle
move.description: User's used hold item is restored.

move.name: Reflect
move.description: Halves damage from Physical attacks for 5 turns.

move.name: Relic Song
move.description: May put the target to sleep.

move.name: Rest
move.description: User sleeps for 2 turns, but user is fully healed.

move.name: Retaliate
move.description: Inflicts double damage if a teammate fainted on the last turn.

move.name: Revelation Dance
move.description: Type changes based on Oricorio's form.

move.name: Revenge
move.description: Power increases if user was hit first.

move.name: Reversal
move.description: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

move.name: Roar
move.description: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

move.name: Rollout
move.description: Doubles in power each turn for 5 turns.

move.name: Roost
move.description: User recovers half of its max HP and loses the Flying type temporarily.

move.name: Rototiller
move.description: Raises Attack and Special Attack of Grass-types.

move.name: Round
move.description: Power increases if teammates use it in the same turn.

move.name: Safeguard
move.description: The user's party is protected from status conditions.

move.name: Sand Tomb
move.description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

move.name: Sappy Seed
move.description: Drains HP from opponent each turn.

move.name: Secret Power
move.description: Effects of the attack vary with the location.

move.name: Secret Sword
move.description: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

move.name: Seismic Toss
move.description: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

move.name: Shadow Bone
move.description: The user attacks by beating the target with a bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

move.name: Shadow Force
move.description: Disappears on first turn, attacks on second. Can strike through Protect/Detect.

move.name: Shell Smash
move.description: Sharply raises user's Attack, Special Attack and Speed but lowers Defense and Special Defense.

move.name: Shell Trap
move.description: Deals more damage to opponent if hit by a Physical move.

move.name: Shift Gear
move.description: Raises user's Attack and sharply raises Speed.

move.name: Shore Up
move.description: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.

move.name: Silver Wind
move.description: May raise all stats of user at once.

move.name: Sketch
move.description: Permanently copies the opponent's last move.

move.name: Skill Swap
move.description: The user swaps Abilities with the opponent.

move.name: Skull Bash
move.description: Raises Defense on first turn, attacks on second.

move.name: Sky Attack
move.description: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May cause flinching.

move.name: Sky Drop
move.description: Takes opponent into the air on first turn, drops them on second turn.

move.name: Sky Uppercut
move.description: Hits the opponent, even during Fly.

move.name: Slack Off
move.description: User recovers half its max HP.

move.name: Sleep Talk
move.description: User performs one of its own moves while sleeping.

move.name: Smack Down
move.description: Makes Flying-type Pokémon vulnerable to Ground moves.

move.name: Smart Strike
move.description: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

move.name: Smelling Salts
move.description: Power doubles if opponent is paralyzed, but cures it.

move.name: Snatch
move.description: Steals the effects of the opponent's next move.

move.name: Snore
move.description: Can only be used if asleep. May cause flinching.

move.name: Soak
move.description: Changes the target's type to water.

move.name: Soft-Boiled
move.description: User recovers half its max HP.

move.name: Solar Beam
move.description: Charges on first turn, attacks on second.

move.name: Solar Blade
move.description: Charges on first turn, attacks on second.

move.name: Sparkling Aria
move.description: Heals the burns of its target.

move.name: Sparkly Swirl
move.description: Cures all status problems in the party Pokémon.

move.name: Spectral Thief
move.description: The user hides in the target's shadow, steals the target's stat boosts, and then attacks.

move.name: Speed Swap
move.description: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

move.name: Spikes
move.description: Hurts opponents when they switch into battle.

move.name: Spiky Shield
move.description: Protects the user and inflicts damage on contact.

move.name: Spit Up
move.description: Power depends on how many times the user performed Stockpile.

move.name: Spite
move.description: The opponent's last move loses 2-5 PP.

move.name: Spotlight
move.description: The user shines a spotlight on the target so that only the target will be attacked during the turn.

move.name: Sticky Web
move.description: Lowers opponent's Speed when switching into battle.

move.name: Stockpile
move.description: Stores energy for use with Spit Up and Swallow.

move.name: Stomping Tantrum
move.description: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user's previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.

move.name: Stored Power
move.description: Power increases when user's stats have been raised.

move.name: Storm Throw
move.description: Always results in a critical hit.

move.name: Strength Sap
move.description: The user restores its HP by the same amount as the target's Attack stat. It also lowers the target's Attack stat.

move.name: Struggle
move.description: Only usable when all PP are gone. Hurts the user.

move.name: Substitute
move.description: Uses HP to creates a decoy that takes hits.

move.name: Sucker Punch
move.description: User attacks first, but only works if opponent is readying an attack.

move.name: Super Fang
move.description: Always takes off half of the opponent's HP.

move.name: Swagger
move.description: Opponent becomes confused, but its Attack is sharply raised.

move.name: Swallow
move.description: The more times the user has performed Stockpile, the more HP is recovered.

move.name: Switcheroo
move.description: Swaps held items with the opponent.

move.name: Synchronoise
move.description: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.

move.name: Synthesis
move.description: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

move.name: Taunt
move.description: Opponent can only use moves that attack.

move.name: Tearful Look
move.description: The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

move.name: Techno Blast
move.description: Type depends on the Drive being held.

move.name: Telekinesis
move.description: Ignores opponent's Evasiveness for three turns, add Ground immunity.

move.name: Teleport
move.description: Allows user to flee wild battles; also warps player to last PokéCenter.

move.name: Thousand Arrows
move.description: Makes Flying-type Pokémon vulnerable to Ground moves.

move.name: Thrash
move.description: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

move.name: Throat Chop
move.description: Prevents use of sound moves for two turns.

move.name: Thunder Fang
move.description: May cause flinching and/or paralyze opponent.

move.name: Torment
move.description: Opponent cannot use the same move in a row.

move.name: Toxic Spikes
move.description: Poisons opponents when they switch into battle.

move.name: Toxic Thread
move.description: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target's Speed stat.

move.name: Transform
move.description: User takes on the form and attacks of the opponent.

move.name: Tri Attack
move.description: May paralyze, burn or freeze opponent.

move.name: Trick
move.description: Swaps held items with the opponent.

move.name: Trick Room
move.description: Slower Pokémon move first in the turn for 5 turns.

move.name: Triple Kick
move.description: Hits thrice in one turn at increasing power.

move.name: Trump Card
move.description: The lower the PP, the higher the power.

move.name: Twineedle
move.description: Hits twice in one turn. May poison opponent.

move.name: Twister
move.description: May cause flinching. Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce with double power.

move.name: U-turn
move.description: User switches out immediately after attacking.

move.name: Uproar
move.description: User attacks for 3 turns and prevents sleep.

move.name: V-create
move.description: Lowers user's Defense, Special Defense and Speed.

move.name: Veevee Volley
move.description: Power increases when player's bond is stronger.

move.name: Venom Drench
move.description: Lowers poisoned opponent's Special Attack and Speed.

move.name: Venoshock
move.description: Inflicts double damage if the target is poisoned.

move.name: Vital Throw
move.description: User attacks last, but ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

move.name: Volt Switch
move.description: User must switch out after attacking.

move.name: Volt Tackle
move.description: User receives recoil damage. May paralyze opponent.

move.name: Wake-Up Slap
move.description: Power doubles if opponent is asleep, but wakes it up.

move.name: Water Pledge
move.description: Added effects appear if preceded by Fire Pledge or succeeded by Grass Pledge.

move.name: Water Sport
move.description: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

move.name: Water Spout
move.description: The higher the user's HP, the higher the damage caused.

move.name: Weather Ball
move.description: Move's power and type changes with the weather.

move.name: Whirlpool
move.description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

move.name: Whirlwind
move.description: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

move.name: Wide Guard
move.description: Protects the user's team from multi-target attacks.

move.name: Wish
move.description: The user recovers HP in the following turn.

move.name: Wonder Room
move.description: Swaps every Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense for 5 turns.

move.name: Work Up
move.description: Raises user's Attack and Special Attack.

move.name: Worry Seed
move.description: Changes the opponent's Ability to Insomnia.

move.name: Wrap
move.description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

move.name: Wring Out
move.description: The higher the opponent's HP, the higher the damage.

move.name: Yawn
move.description: Puts opponent to sleep in the next turn.

move.name: Zing Zap
move.description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target, giving it an electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.
